description:
For someone with a lot of money, you would think Kamala could hire a speaking coach to help her at least put the most basic sentences and thoughts together. However, that does not seem to have crossed her mind, as she continues to toss the most foolish word salads every time she opens her mouth.

Kamala did what any hopeful California governor would do, which is visit a disaster site in a disingenuous PR move. However, most politicians can at least speak in a way that a kindergartener can understand but that is not the case for Kamala.

In her most inspiring speech yet, Kamala claimed you can “smell” and “feel” the fire damage.

Kamala Harris is asked for her thoughts on the LA fires. Her response is even worse than you were expecting.
title: Kamala Harris performs her most inspiring" speech yet while touring CA fire destruction: "You can smell it"

description:
Ilhan Omar is doing what she does best, which is slandering Americans as a way to project her insecurities on the rest of the world.

Omar, who may or may not have married her brother, thinks Trump won because of “the level of stupidity that [Americans] are displaying every single day,” which she describes as " frankly embarrassing.”

Ilhan Omar mocks "stupid" Americans pic.twitter.com/jGITli2swg
— End Wokeness (@EndWokeness) February 23, 2025

What is highly absurd about her statements is not that she slanders half the country solely because she disagrees with them politically but because she bashes the people of the nation who gave her everything and more.
title: In Ilhan Omar's latest anti-American rant, she declares YOU as the stupid one

description:

title: From Rumble to Trump’s White House: Can Dan Bongino Save American Law?

description:
President Donald Trump announced yesterday Dan Bongino will be the FBI’s new Deputy Director, Joy Reid’s evening show "the Reid Out" is being cancelled, the Alternative for Deutschland AfD party won their election in Germany on Sunday and we were there, John Oliver is claiming Big Tech never targeted conservatives, and more!

BONGINO FBI DEPUTY DIRECTOR

  • “Great news for Law Enforcement and American Justice!"
title: Trump Drops a Bombshell: Bongino’s FBI Takeover & Crowder in Berlin Exclusive (Sources)

description:
We here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website try our best not to tempt the wrath of the whatever from high atop the thing by saying we may never lose again. When a woke governor goes to the White House and gets snippy at Donald Trump, bragging that she's REFUSING to enforce his executive order banning boys from playing in girls' sports... never say never, but it's as if the left never wants to WIN again.

Trump invited a bipartisan group of governors to the White House to discuss how they could work together. One of them, Democrat Maine Gov. Janet Mills, decided that instead of working together, she would snipe at the EO and threaten to see Donald Trump in court. Trump responded: Bet.
title: Donald Trump GOES OFF on another woke gov refusing to keep boys out of girls' sports: "You better do it, or... "

description:
Donald Trump won Wisconsin by 0.77% in 2016, lost by 0.63% in 2020, and won by 0.86% in 2024. If there was a purple state in the midwest, it's the home to cheese curds and Happy Days. Gov. Tony Evers saw the massive hit his party took and the vibe shift across America, stuck his fingers in his ears, ran around the Capitol, and yelled, "I'm not listing." He wants the word "mother" removed from state law to be replaced with a non-gendered term to appease... gotta be honest, I'm not even sure at this point.

The new word for "mother?"

Inseminated people.

I can't imagine people with front holes are impressed by this.

<
title: Woke governor demands new offensive thing to call women instead of "mother" because Democrats haven't lost bad enough
